i1.name: Prophet of an Elder God
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Periodically, '''Illaoi''' spawns a {{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}} on the nearest terrain perpendicular to her location, if no other Tentacles are already nearby it. Tentacles fully spawn after a 2 second delay and are {{tip|untargetable}} in the meantime.

{{as|Tentacles|buzzword2}} deal {{as|{{pp|10 to 180}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 120% AD)}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}} {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies struck when commanded to attack by her [[champion ability|abilities]]. Each {{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}} also {{tip|heal|heals}} '''Illaoi''' for {{as|5% of her '''missing''' health}} if it hits at least one enemy {{tip|champion}}. ''See [[#Pets|Pet Details]] for more details.''
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Periodically, Illaoi spawns a Tentacle on the nearest terrain perpendicular to her location, if no other Tentacles are already nearby it. Tentacles fully spawn after a 2 second delay and are untargetable in the meantime.
Tentacles deal 10undefined − 180undefined (based on level) (+ 120% AD) (+ 40% AP) physical damage to all enemies struck when commanded to attack by her champion ability. Each Tentacle also heals Illaoi for 5% of her missing health if it hits at least one enemy champion. See #Pets for more details.
i1.notes:
* '''Illaoi''' cannot spawn '''''{{as|Tentacles|buzzword2}}''''' on ally invulnerable {{tip|turrets|structures}}, in addition to neither her nor the '''''{{as|Vessel|buzzword3}}''''' being able to spawn them in [[Nexus Obelisk|Nexus Obelisk's]] attack range.
* Terrain also includes player-made terrain and terrain that is passable by a team but not by the other (e.g. [[Base gate|base gates]]).
* The '''''{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}''''' will continue its spawn animation and be able to start an attack, after the animation ends, even if '''Illaoi''' or a '''''{{as|Vessel|buzzword3}}''''' are not nearby.
* If '''Illaoi''' uses {{ai|Harsh Lesson|Illaoi}} during '''''{{as|Tentacles'|buzzword2}}''''' spawn animation, they won't attack but the SFX of the attack will still be heard.
** When this happens, the '''''{{as|Tentacle's|buzzword2}}''''' next attack after spawning will be delayed, as if the tentacle was performing an invisible attack.
** After the tentacle spawns, there's a {{fd|0.25}} second delay during which they may only be commanded to attack by a {{ai|Harsh Lesson|Illaoi}}. If followed by a {{ai|Test of Spirit|Illaoi}} command, this attack will be slightly delayed, as per above.

q1.name: Tentacle Smash
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Illaoi''' slams down a {{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}} in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}}.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Tentacle damage is increased.
Active: Illaoi slams down a Tentacle in the target direction, dealing physical damage.
q1.notes:
* ''Tentacle Smash's'' hitbox is fixed in front of '''Illaoi''', while the indicator on the ground is fixed to the targeted direction.
* If '''Illaoi''' is not {{tip|sight|visible}}, the slam will be seen but it will not be heard.
q1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '0' as '0' and riot's value '10,9,8,7,6' as '10/9/8/7/6'

w1.name: Harsh Lesson
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Illaoi's''' next [[basic attack]] within 6 seconds gains {{sti|range|225 '''bonus''' range}} and causes her to {{tip|dash|leap}} to the target's location if they're beyond her normal basic attack range.

The attack deals {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, with a minimum threshold, and capped at 300 against non-champions, and commands all {{as|Tentacles|buzzword2}} in range to attack the target. The minimum '''bonus''' damage can also be applied against {{tip|turrets}}.
''Harsh Lesson'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Illaoi's''' basic attack timer.
''Harsh Lesson can be activated during '''Illaoi's''' other abilities, other than while {{ai|E|Illaoi|pulling}} a {{as|Spirit|buzzword}}.''
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Illaoi's next basic attack within 6 seconds gains 225 bonus range and causes her to leap to the target's location if they're beyond her normal basic attack range.
The attack deals bonus physical damage, with a minimum threshold, and capped at 300 against non-champions, and commands all Tentacles in range to attack the target. The minimum bonus damage can also be applied against turrets.
Harsh Lesson resets Illaoi's basic attack timer.
Harsh Lesson can be activated during Illaoi's other abilities, other than while pulling a Spirit.
leveling:
{{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{as|{{ap|3 to 5}}% {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health|health}}}}
{{st|Minimum Physical Damage|{{ap|20 to 60}}}}
w1.notes:
* The '''bonus''' damage doesn't apply {{sti|life steal|link=true}} but it does apply {{stil|spell vamp}}.
** {{Pending for test}}: [[Omnivamp]]
* ''Harsh Lesson'' is made of two different abilities which are decided by '''Illaoi's''' range to the target, being either {{tip|melee}} or within {{tip|dash}} range.
* The close range ability:
** Has an {{tip|uncancelable windup}}.
** Can be used while {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}}. If '''Illaoi''' attack commands and then casts ''Harsh Lesson'', she will use the close range ''Harsh Lesson'' even if the target is beyond her melee range.
** Starting the attack before triggering {{iis|Guardian Angel}} passive and hitting while she's in it will not cause the '''''{{as|Tentacles|buzzword2}}''''' to slam.
** The attack will still hit if the target becomes {{tip|untargetable}}, but will not if it {{tip|death|dies}}.
** Does trigger {{ri|Hail of Blades}}.
** Triggers {{ii|Kircheis Shard|Energized}} effects [[on-hit]].
** If the empowered attack duration ends during the attack animation, the attack won't be empowered.
* The dash range ability:
** Does not have an uncancelable windup, meaning effects that can interrupt the dash will cancel the attack and put the ability on cooldown.
** Can be cast but cannot be used while {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}} because '''Illaoi''' loses the {{sti|'''bonus''' attack range}}.
** The attack will not hit if the target becomes {{tip|untargetable}}, but does hit if it {{tip|death|dies}}.
** Does not trigger {{ri|Hail of Blades}}.
** Triggers {{ii|Kircheis Shard|Energized}} effects during the jump.
** Having enough attack speed will perform an unusual dunk.
** Having increased size will increase the range of her ''Harsh Lesson'' but the indicator range will not change.
** If the empowered attack duration ends during the dash, the buff will linger until the attack has finished.
* Parrying the attack ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|block}}, {{tip|blind}}) will not trigger {{ai|Prophet of an Elder God||{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}}} slams, with the exception of:
** {{tip|Block}} when using a close range ''Harsh Lesson''.
** {{tip|Blind}} when using a dash range ''Harsh Lesson''.
* If the target dies at the instant ''Harsh Lesson'' is about to hit the target, the attack will hit, be consumed, but will not make the '''''{{as|Tentacles|buzzword2}}''''' slam.
* The '''''{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}''''' attacking because of ''Harsh Lesson'' is considered to be part of it, and thus will not grant additional stacks of {{ri|Conqueror}}, {{ri|Electrocute}}, {{ri|Phase Rush}} and [[Named item effect#|Tribute]].
* ''Harsh Lesson's'' '''bonus''' damage applies before {{iis|Blade of the Ruined King}} damage.
* ''Harsh Lesson'' triggers {{ri|Bone Plating}} and one of its plates with the same attack.
* Attack moving while charging {{si|Hexflash}} will delay the attack.
w1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|4|Starts post-effect}}' as '4/0' and riot's value '4,4,4,4,4' as '4'

effects.str:
• Bonus Physical Damage: % (+ 2% per 100 AD) of target's maximum health

  • Minimum Physical Damage:

st_slices: % (+ 2% per 100 AD) of target's '''maximum''' health

e1.name: Test of Spirit
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Illaoi''' reaches forward with a tendril that stops at the first enemy hit, pulling their {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} out in front of '''Illaoi''' over {{fd|0.75}} seconds if they're a {{tip|champion}}. The target is {{tip|tether|tethered}} to the {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} for {{tt|7 seconds|Timer starts when the spirit starts being pulled}}, {{tip|true sight|revealing}} them in addition to granting {{tip|sight}} of the area around them while the tether remains.

The {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} has the target's {{sti|health|{{as|'''current''' health}}}}, {{sti|{{as|armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|magic resist}}}}, and redirects a portion of the {{tt|pre-mitigation damage|Damage calculated before modifiers}} received to the tethered champion.

When the {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} is killed or the target leaves tether range, the tether is severed, marking the target as a {{as|Vessel|buzzword3}} for 10 seconds and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 80% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds once the tether returns back to them. Each {{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}} autonomously attacks the closest {{as|Vessel|buzzword3}} or {{as|Spirit|buzzword}}, prioritizing the latter, once every {{pp|5.5 to 3.5 for 3|1 to 13|formula=5.5-1 every 6 lvls. Cooldown starts upon starting the slam}} seconds.

Enemies made a {{as|Vessel|buzzword3}} also spawn a {{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}} near themselves every {{pp|5 to 3 for 3|1 to 13}} seconds. {{as|Tentacles|buzzword2}} can spawn exceptionally closer to each other than when spawned by '''Illaoi'''.

'''''Illaoi''' is {{tip|lockout|unable to act}} while firing the projectile and while the target's {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} is being pulled.''
'''''Illaoi''' cannot re-cast the ability while the {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} is alive.''
''{{as|Vessels|buzzword3}} can dispel the {{tip|debuff}} by {{tip|takedown|taking down}} '''Illaoi'''.''
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Illaoi reaches forward with a tendril that stops at the first enemy hit, pulling their Spirit out in front of Illaoi over 0.75 seconds if they're a champion. The target is tethered to the Spirit for 7 seconds, revealing them in addition to granting sight of the area around them while the tether remains.
The Spirit has the target's current health, armor and magic resist, and redirects a portion of the pre-mitigation damage received to the tethered champion.
When the Spirit is killed or the target leaves tether range, the tether is severed, marking the target as a Vessel for 10 seconds and slowing them by 80% for 1.5 seconds once the tether returns back to them. Each Tentacle autonomously attacks the closest Vessel or Spirit, prioritizing the latter, once every 1 to 13 ‒ undefined seconds.
Enemies made a Vessel also spawn a Tentacle near themselves every 1 to 13 ‒ undefined seconds. Tentacles can spawn exceptionally closer to each other than when spawned by Illaoi.
Illaoi is unable to act while firing the projectile and while the target's Spirit is being pulled.

Illaoi cannot re-cast the ability while the Spirit is alive.

Vessels can dispel the debuff by taking down Illaoi.
e1.notes:
* {{as|Spirits|buzzword}} are classified as {{tip|clone|clones}}:
** {{as|Spirits|buzzword}} can only be targeted by '''Illaoi's''' team and neutral monsters. The {{as|Spirit's|buzzword}} allies cannot target it.
** {{as|Spirits|buzzword}} take 50% damage from [[turret]]s and do not cause turrets to {{ii|Ohmwrecker (Turret Item)|Warm Up}} their attacks.
** {{as|Spirits|buzzword}} cannot be {{tip|heal|healed}} nor {{tip|shield|shielded}} ({{ri|Summon Aery}} excluded).
** The {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} levels up when the {{as|Vessel|buzzword2}} does. Doing so will increase the {{as|Spirit's|buzzword}} {{as|health}}, {{as|armor}}, and {{as|magic resist}}, and additionally extend its lifetime by 1 second.
* The {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} is {{tip|untargetable}} while it is being pulled.
* Redirected damage is calculated by taking the pre-mitigation damage, applying ''Test of Spirit's'' damage modifier, and then capping it to the {{as|Spirit's|buzzword}} {{as|'''current''' health}}. This damage will then be affected by damage modifiers (resistances and other effects) of the {{as|Vessel|buzzword3}}.
** This means that the damage received by the {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} is not representative of the damage redirected to the {{as|Vessel|buzzword3}}, as each calculates their damage taken based on their respective modifiers.
** If the {{as|Spirit's|buzzword}} damage modifier is lower than the {{as|Vessel's|buzzword3}}, it will cause an increase in total redirected damage, else it will cause a decrease.
** If the {{as|Spirit's|buzzword}} damage modifier is higher than ''Test of Spirit's'', it will cause an increase in total redirected damage, else it will cause a decrease. The difference in damage is up to a cap.
** '''Illaoi''' needs {{as|{{ap|(100-(25 to 45))/8*100}} '''total''' AD}} to reach 100% redirected damage. As per above, the damage is still dependent on the {{as|Spirit's|buzzword}} and {{as|Vessel's|buzzword3}} damage modifiers and may not always be able to deal 100% of the target's '''current''' health as total redirected damage.
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} may only prevent the initial spirit grab and the ''slow'' upon becoming a {{as|Vessel|buzzword3}}. ''Spell shields'' will not prevent becoming a {{as|Vessel|buzzword3}} or {{as|Tentacles|buzzword2}} from attacking.
* The tendril can be blocked by abilities such as {{cai|W|Yasuo}}, but the returning tether slow cannot, even if it can otherwise be {{tip|homing projectile destruction|destroyed}} by effects that can do so (i.e {{tip|untargetability}}).
** The tether slow will not be fired if the target is already {{tip|untargetability|untargetable}} when the {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} dies.
* The spirit pull is not considered a {{tip|crowd control}} effect and will not be blocked by {{tip|cc-immune|crowd control immunity}}, with the exception of {{cai|E|Morgana}}.{{bug|2}}
* If the target becomes a {{as|Vessel|buzzword3}} within range of a dormant {{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}, that {{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}} will skip its first attack.
* The tentacle model of the first cast is connected to '''Illaoi's''' body and will stop moving when '''Illaoi''' does (e.g {{tip|stasis}}, {{tip|sleep}}, {{tip|airborne}}). However, the projectile will not, and will be able to hit enemies away from its model position. It will also not be seen by enemies if '''Illaoi''' is not {{tip|Sight|visible}}, but it will be heard if the tentacle passes through their vision.
* ''Test of Spirit'' will fire from wherever '''Illaoi''' is at the end of the cast time towards the same pointed location.
* Grabbing the {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} of a champion before it goes into {{tip|resurrection}} via {{ai|R|Zilean}} or {{ii|Guardian Angel}} will spawn the {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} with 0 health, making it {{tip|invulnerable}}.
** The same does not happen with other ''resurrection'' effects (i.e {{cai|I|Karthus}}) since they leave the champion with more than 0 health.
* Grabbing the {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} of a champion with {{tip|Flow}} or {{tip|Ferocity}} will make the {{as|Spirit's|buzzword}} lifetime (the white bar below the lifebar) disappear.
* Grabbing the {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} of an {{ai|R|Kalista|Oathsworn}}, or of a champion that is {{tip|camouflage|camouflaged}} while they are being revealed by a {{ii|Control Ward}}, will make the {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} invisible.
* Only '''Illaoi''' can see who's been {{as|Vesseled|buzzword3}}, with their model covered in watery effects. The {{as|Vessel|buzzword3}} itself will instead have its screen covered in watery effects.
* The {{as|Vessel|buzzword3}} status effect is a debuff that doesn't ''persist through death''.
* If the enemy champion is {{tip|resurrection|resurrecting}} when the conditions for becoming a {{as|Vessel|buzzword3}} are met, then they will not revive as a {{as|Vessel|buzzword3}}.
* Runes consider the {{as|Spirit|Buzzword}} as a champion for their effects and stat-tracking.
** {{ri|Predator}} only reflects double bonus damage, not taking into account actual damage done to the {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} (e.g if {{ri|Predator}} would deal 60 bonus damage, what would get reflected is 120 damage).
* Transferred damage will apply on-damage effects, such as {{ii|Black Cleaver}}, {{ii|Morellonomicon}}, {{ii|Executioner's Calling}}, {{ii|Riftmaker}}, {{bi|Aspect of the Dragon}} burn damage.
** The {{as|Spirit|Buzzword}} will also redirect the '''bonus''' damage dealt by ''Riftmaker'' and ''Aspect of the Dragon'', effectively double diping their damage to the {{as|Vessel|buzzword3}}. In particular, ''Riftmaker'' also further increases its own redirected damage, granting an additional {{fd|0.81%}} '''bonus''' damage at full stacks, for a total of {{fd|18.81%}}.
* {{Pending for test}}: Healing from {{tip|Omnivamp}}
** Transferred damage will not doubly apply on-hit or on-spell effects versus the target (e.g. {{ii|Liandry's Anguish}}, {{ri|Phase Rush}} stacks). These effects are only applied versus the {{as|Spirit|buzzword}}.
** Attacking the {{as|Vessel|buzzword3}} and its {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} simultaneously will only apply one stack of {{ii|Black Cleaver}} to the {{as|Vessel|buzzword3}}.
* Once the {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} vanishes, whether defeated or not, '''Illaoi''' will get 1 creep score in-game (not included in the post-game counter).
* The {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} is immune to {{tip|stasis}} (i.e. {{cai|Tempered Fate|Bard}}).
* {{cai|Riposte|Fiora}} can be used to prevent becoming a {{as|Vessel|buzzword3}} if used before the {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} is killed or while leaving the tether's range.
* {{cis|Sion}} {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} cannot be spawned during {{ai|Glory in Death|Sion}}. {{as|Spirits|buzzword}} created before ''Sion's'' {{tip|zombie state}} will remain active.
* If the target that had its {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} pulled from them is taken into the {{ai|Realm of Death|Mordekaiser}}, the tether will break, but they will not be made into a {{as|Vessel|buzzword3}}.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Illaoi''' is firing the projectile and while the target's {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} is being pulled:
{{ct|attack=false|move=false|cast=false|items=false|consume=false|spells=true,false,false,false,false|interrupts=death}}
e1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|{{ap|16 to 12}}|Starts on cast}}' as '0/14.667/13.333/12/10.667/0' and riot's value '16,15,14,13,12' as '16/15/14/13/12'

effects.str: • Damage Transmission: % (+ 8% per 100 AD)

r1.name: Leap of Faith
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Illaoi''' gains {{tip|displacement immunity}} and leaps into the air for the cast time. She then slams her idol into the ground, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to nearby enemies. For each enemy champion hit, a {{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}} is summoned for 8 seconds (up to a maximum of 6 summons).

For the duration, {{ais|Harsh Lesson|Illaoi}} {{sti|cooldown}} is halved, all {{as|Tentacles|buzzword2}} awakened by '''Illaoi''' are {{tip|untargetable}}, will not show their hitboxes, nor go dormant, and will take half the amount of time to make an attack.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Illaoi gains displacement immunity and leaps into the air for the cast time. She then slams her idol into the ground, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. For each enemy champion hit, a Tentacle is summoned for 8 seconds (up to a maximum of 6 summons).
For the duration, Harsh Lesson's cooldown is halved, all Tentacles awakened by Illaoi are untargetable, will not show their hitboxes, nor go dormant, and will take half the amount of time to make an attack.
r1.notes:
* ''Leap of Faith's'' effects are centered around '''Illaoi''' at the end of the cast time.
** {{si|Flash}} can be used during the cast time to reposition her.
* {{tip|Clone|Clones}} also count as champions for the summoning of the '''''{{ai|Prophet of an Elder God||{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}}}'''''.
* '''Illaoi''' spawns the '''''{{ai|Prophet of an Elder God||{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}}}''''' 725 range away from her, unless there's a natural wall blocking the way making the '''''{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}''''' spawn on it, based on:
** The direction she's facing.
*** She will always face at the nearest {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy champion, in ''Leap of Faith's'' range, the instant she leaps.
*** If there's no enemy champion nearby, she faces in the direction of the cursor.
*** {{si|Flash|Flashing}} mid-animation will change the spawning direction to where the cursor is pointed, regardless of the nearest enemy champion.
** How many champions she hits.
*** 1+ champions: one {{ai|Prophet of an Elder God||{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}}} at 0 degrees. (in front of '''Illaoi''')
*** 2+ champions: one {{ai|Prophet of an Elder God||{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}}} at 60 degrees.
*** 3+ champions: one {{ai|Prophet of an Elder God||{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}}} at 300 degrees.
*** 4+ champions: one {{ai|Prophet of an Elder God||{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}}} at 120 degrees.
*** 5+ champions: one {{ai|Prophet of an Elder God||{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}}} at 240 degrees.
*** 6+ champions: one {{ai|Prophet of an Elder God||{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}}} at 180 degrees.
** If there are no walls nearby, spawning the last {{ai|Prophet of an Elder God||{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}}} will form a perfect hexagon.
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will block the ability's damage but will not prevent '''''{{as|Tentacles|buzzword2}}''''' from spawning.
* If '''Illaoi''' {{tip|death|dies}} within {{fd|0.25}} seconds of dropping down, she will still spawn '''''{{as|Tentacles|buzzword2}}''''', but they will not be buffed.
* If '''Illaoi''' is near a '''''{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}''''' that is about to spawn, it will spawn buffed by ''Leap of Faith'' even if '''Illaoi''' is no longer nearby.
* Using ''{{ai|Harsh Lesson}}'' after '''Illaoi''' drops down will command '''''{{as|Tentacles|buzzword2}}''''' to instantly attack, regardless if they were already attacking. Their old attack will keep on going and will hit while the second attack is on its animation attack.
* Using ''{{ai|Harsh Lesson}}'' an instant before ''Leap of Faith's'' buff finishes will delay the '''''{{as|Tentacle's|buzzword2}}''''' attack.
